Class Subpopulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.Instance_Selection.CoCoIS.Subpopulation

  • public class Subpopulation
extends java.lang.Object
    File: Subpopulation.java This class manage the subpopulations of selectors of the CoCoIS model
    Since:
    JDK1.5
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Written by Joaquin Derrac (University of Granada) 3/3/2010

      • Subpopulation

        public Subpopulation(int id,
                     double[][] train,
                     int[] out)
        Builder. Generates a new subpopulation from a subset of the entire training set
        Parameters:
        id - Identifier of the population
        train - Subset of training data
        out - Output attribute of the subset of training data
